content.text: Detective Pikachu is n't the only Pokémon movie coming out this year - the anime team will also be continuing its yearly cycle , though this time around it 's an even bigger break from the norm than the past two years of what were effectively cinematic reboots . The First Movie , Mewtwo Strikes Back , is getting remade in CG with the new subtitle EVOLUTION , and now , we have our first trailer ... Mewtwo Strikes Back EVOLUTION will hit Japanese theaters on July 12th , likely to be followed by a western release later in the year . Hopefully cinema showings will come with a free Ancient Mew card again ...
